titles.title: I am the bread of life

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I am the bread of life.
He who comes to shall
no hunger, he who believes
in me shall not thirst.
No one can come to me
unless the father draw him.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
And I will raise him up x3
on the last day.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The bread that I will give,
is my flesh for the life
of the world,
And he who eats of this bread,
he shall live forever. x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Unless you eat of the flesh,
of the Son of Man.
And drink of his blood,
and drink of his blood,
you shall not have life
within you.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I am the resurrection,
I am the life,
He who believes in me,
ever if he die, he shall;
live for ever.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Yes Lord I believe,
that you are the Christ,
the son of God, who have
come into the world.
